newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yuganskneftegaz 96 pref dividend set at 1,033 rbls.
newsitem.headline: Yuganskneftegaz 96 pref dividend set at 1,033 rbls.

text.p: Russia's OAO Yuganskneftegaz YFGA.RTS crude oil producer will pay a 1996 dividend of 1,033 roubles per preferred share, down from the 1,256 roubles it paid for 1995, the producer's parent company YUKOS said on Friday.
Shareholders approved the dividend for the 200-rouble nominal share at an annual meeting on Friday.
For the second year in a row, dividends on ordinary shares would not be paid, a YUKOS statement said.
The oil producer's capital investments last year were 2.69 trillion roubles, above targeted levels of 2.35 trillion.
Sales totalled 13.11 trillion roubles. No full or comparison figures were provided.
Yuganskneftegaz is the main production unit of YUKOS, Russia's second-largest vertically-integrated oil company by production.
